text: Ajax the Great or Aias () son of Telamon,timelessmyths.com Retrieved on 25 November 2007 was a hero from the Trojan War. He was a cousin of Achilles. Ajax died by suicide. This happened after Achilles died and Ajax was in a contest with Odysseus to see who would receive Achilles's armour. Ajax lost the contest. ==Related pages== * Ajax the Lesser == References == Category:People in Greek mythology
title: Ajax the Great
